name: 胡國英
objective: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
schedule:
1　　Principles of Electrical Power
2　　Principles of Electrical Power
3　　Diode Rectifier Circuits
4　　Diode Rectifier Circuits
5　　Phase-Controlled Rectifier Circuits
6　　Phase-Controlled Rectifier Circuits
7　　Introduction to DC-DC Converters: The Buck Converter
8　　Introduction to DC-DC Converters: The Buck Converter
9　　Midterm
10　　General Theory of Two-Level DC-DC Converters: Boost and Buck/Boost Converters
11　　General Theory of Two-Level DC-DC Converters: Boost and Buck/Boost Converters
12　　Dynamic Modeling and Simulation of DC-DC Converters
13　　Dynamic Modeling and Simulation of DC-DC Converters
14　　Inverters: Converting DC to AC
15　　Inverters: Converting DC to AC
16　　Thermal Management
17　　Thermal Management
18　　Final
scorePolicy:
期中考:40%
期末考:40%
小考:20%
materials:
Book: UNDAMENTALS of POWER ELECTRONICS with MATLAB
Author: JRandall Shaffer
Publisher: THOMSON
